entry.title: Segmenting Lungs from Chest X-Rays using ResUnet Architecture (Pytorch)

link.title: Segmenting Lungs from Chest X-Rays using ResUnet Architecture (Pytorch)

entry.summary: In this blog, I will demonstrate how to deal with segmentation problems in 2D Medical images (Chest X-rays). You will get familiar with various preprocessing+post processing, data augmentation techniques, tips, and dead-ends in 2D Medical images segmentation. Keywords- Medical Imaging, Deep Learning, Pytorch, MONAI, Chest X-Ray, Segmentation, UNet, ResUnet, Lung segmentaion, tutorial, MICCAI

entry.title: How to approach a 2D Medical Images(Chest-X-Rays) classification problem using Pytorch and MONAI

link.title: How to approach a 2D Medical Images(Chest-X-Rays) classification problem using Pytorch and MONAI

entry.summary: In this blog, I will demonstrate how to approach the classification problems of 2D Medical images (Chest X-rays). You will get familiar with various preprocessing+post processing, data augmentation techniques, tips, and dead-ends in Chest X rays classification. Keywords- Medical Imaging, Deep Learning, Pytorch, MONAI, Chest X-Ray, Pydicom, Pneumonia-COVID-Classifciation, tutorial, MICCAI
